mapper.select: select sql_calc_found_rows (@ranking := @ranking + 1) as `rank`, r.* from (select u.user_id, u.name, committed, passed, truncate(score, 2) as score from leaderboard join user u on leaderboard.user_id = u.user_id where u.role_id = 0 and score > 0 order by score desc, update_time) r, (select @ranking := #{start}) rn limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows();

select sql_calc_found_rows (@ranking := @ranking + 1) as `rank`, r.* from (select u.user_id, name, committed, passed, truncate(score, 2) as score from leaderboard_contest join user u on leaderboard_contest.user_id = u.user_id where contest_id = #{contestId} and u.role_id = 0 and score > 0 order by score desc, update_time) r, (select @ranking := #{start}) rn limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows();
